name: G6Superhomes
0:
”"Alexa, turn on Superhome"”
”"Alexa, set the fan speed to 4"”
”"Alexa, turn on hallway lights"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you you face any problems, please contact us at info@g6superhomes.in 
Or else you can visit our site to get more info, http://g6superhomes.in

G6 Superhomes voice controlled skill lets you interact with the G6 products installed in your home. It lets you turn on/off or control the speed of various devices and appliances. Like LEDs, lamps, TV, walkway lights, ceiling fans, table fans etc.

Here's a step by step guide:
1. Search for the skill "G6 Superhomes"
2. Tap on it. It'll take you to login with amazon page
3. Now provide your amazon account username and password.
4. Once you have logged in successfully. The appliances will be visible.
4. Now, you can interact with your Superhome!

Here are some commands you can say to interact with your Superhome,

FAN

Alexa, turn on the fan
Alexa, what is the fan speed?
Alexa, turn off the fan


LIGHT

Alexa, turn on the light
Alexa, turn off the light


SWITCH

Alexa, turn on the switch
Alexa, turn off the switch
